name: web-analyst
description: Web Analyst is a simple back-end tracking system to measure your web app performance.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:template && to-esm hybrid/cjs/*.cjs --output web/web-analyst/js && to-esm lib/common.cjs --output ./web/js
scripts.run:stats: npm run build:all && npx --yes genserve@latest restart stats.project --dir web --dir C:/projects/genserve/my-server.web --port 8080 --dir node_modules/tabulator-tables
scripts.run:stats2: npm run build:all && npx --yes genserve@latest restart stats.project --dir web --dir C:/projects/web-analyst/my-server.web --port 8080 --dir node_modules/tabulator-tables
scripts.run:stats3: npm run build:all && npx --yes genserve@latest restart --dir web --dir C:/projects/genserve/stats/genserve.projects --port 8080
